Key Match Events: Jazz Chisholm Jr.'s infield single in the 11th inning secured a thrilling 4-3 victory for the New York Yankees over the Kansas City Royals.
Juan Soto’s go-ahead home run in the sixth extended the Yankees’ lead in the AL East to 1 1/2 games over Baltimore.
Michael Massey’s home run provided a brief lead for the Royals.
The Royals’ successful challenge of a safe call at first base.
